pkgmetadata.longdescription: # dwq - a Disque based work queuedwq (Disque Work Queue) is a tool that can be used to distribute Jobs on gitrepositories across multiple machines.## Installation # pip install dwq## UsageStart a worker: # dwqwExecute a command on worker: # dwqc -r <repository> -c <commit> lsMore sophisticated: # export DWQ_REPO=<repository> DWQ_COMMIT=<commit> # for i in $(seq 10); do echo 'echo $DWQ_WORKER:$DWQ_WORKER_THREAD'; done | dwqc
